Home Gallery Slideshow Tools Share Send Home_with_Tabbed Tab 1 Tab 2 Navigation open close The Cake Fairy is a cake shop.It is an app the allows users to check for various cakes available and purchase online. \nAs thre is great demond of putting everything online ,so to follow the chain of digitalization we directly provide this service and surprice your loves ones with the cake party. \nWe at \'the Cake Fairy\' promises to deliver the best and hygenic cakes at reasonable cost.Our key is to provide each and everyone to have a fun party at different occasions. \nFor any suggestions and complain you can give your feedback us at our feedback form.
